t: The Lord Is on Our Side
A song of ascents. Of David.
If*pn the Lord*s had not been on our side — let*ln Israel say —
if*ln the Lord*s had not been on our side when*ln people attacked us,
then*ln they would have swallowed us alive in*ln their burning anger against us.
Then*ln the water would have engulfed us; the*ln torrent would have swept over us;
the*ln raging water would have swept over us.
Blessed*pn be the Lord,*s who*ln has not let us be ripped apart by their teeth.
We*ln have escaped like a bird from the hunter’s net; the*ln net is torn, and we have escaped.
Our*ln help is in the name of the Lord,*s the*ln Maker of heaven and earth.
